'''2.3.508''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on November 21, 2022.

== Changes ==
* Updates to game purchase flow.
* Accessibility improvements.

== Fixes ==
* Fix to game installation bug when Launcher gets closed.
* Fixes to how green dot & messaging works in the Launcher.
